com.ubtrobot.mini.speech.framework.demo

Class MicrophoneStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.cognitiveservices.speech.audio.PullAudioInputStreamCallback
      • com.ubtrobot.mini.speech.framework.demo.MicrophoneStream

  • public class MicrophoneStream
extends com.microsoft.cognitiveservices.speech.audio.PullAudioInputStreamCallback
    MicrophoneStream exposes the Android Microphone as an PullAudioInputStreamCallback to be consumed by the Speech SDK. It configures the microphone with 16 kHz sample rate, 16 bit samples, mono (single-channel). Provided entirely by Microsoft.
